adjectives.description: felsic (comparative more felsic, superlative most felsic)

entries.meaning: (mineralogy) Enriched in the lighter elements such as silicon, oxygen, aluminium, sodium, and potassium.
examples: Much of the southern half of the southeastern body is a mafic syenite, slightly more felsic than the shonkinite.

The central part of this nepheline syenite is very white felsics with black mafics in it. The entire area contains many nepheline-bearing dike rocks, but almost all are gray or pink or even red due to the color in the felsics.
